chart.title: Per capita greenhouse gas emissions
chart.subtitle: [Greenhouse gas emissions](#dod:ghgemissions) include carbon dioxide, methane and nitrous oxide from all sources, including [land-use change](#dod:land-use-change-emissions). They are measured in tonnes of [carbon dioxide-equivalents](#dod:carbondioxideequivalents) over a 100-year timescale.
chart.note: Land-use change emissions can be negative.
chart.citation: Jones et al. (2025); Population based on various sources (2024)

Per capita greenhouse gas emissions in C.titleShort: Per capita greenhouse gas emissions including land use
Per capita greenhouse gas emissions in C.titleLong: Per capita greenhouse gas emissions including land use
Per capita greenhouse gas emissions in C.descriptionShort: [Greenhouse gas emissions](#dod:ghgemissions) are measured in tonnes per person of [carbon dioxide-equivalents](#dod:carbondioxideequivalents) over a 100-year timescale.
Per capita greenhouse gas emissions in C.descriptionProcessing: Emissions given in tonnes have been converted to carbon-dioxide equivalents over a 100-year timescale using a conversion factor of 273 for nitrous oxide, 29.8 for methane from fossil sources, and 27.2 for methane from agricultural and land use sources. These factors are taken from the 6th Assessment Report (AR6) of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC).
Per capita greenhouse gas emissions in C.unit: tonnes of CO₂ equivalents per person
